    • Constructor Detail

      • Viterbi

        public Viterbi(INDArray possibleLabels)
        The possible outcomes for the chain. This should be the labels in the form of the possible outcomes (1,2,3) not the binarized label matrix
        Parameters:
        possibleLabels - the possible labels of the markov chain

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        public Pair<java.lang.Double,INDArray> decode(INDArray labels)
        Decodes the given labels, assuming its a binary label matrix
        Parameters:
        labels - the labels as a binary label matrix
        Returns:
        the decoded labels and the most likely outcome of the sequence

      • decode

        public Pair<java.lang.Double,INDArray> decode(INDArray labels,
                                              boolean binaryLabelMatrix)
        Decodes a series of labels
        Parameters:
        labels - the labels to decode
        binaryLabelMatrix - whether the label is a binary label matrix
        Returns:
        the most likely sequence and the sequence labels
